## textToAudioAsset variable

Synthesizes some text into a readable stream representing the speech. Then it generates an audio asset from that speech.

**Signature:**

```typescript
textToAudioAsset: (config: Config) => Promise<{
    error: Error;
    value?: undefined;
} | {
    value: {
        message: string;
        href: string;
    };
    error?: undefined;
}>
```
